item.title: Creating custom recommendations & standards for AWS/GCP workloads with Microsoft Defender for Cloud
item.description:
Introduction: Have you ever found yourself in a situation where you wanted to determine which AWS resources are missing a tag? You can accomplish this use case using custom recommendations for AWS workloads in Defender for Cloud. The following steps solve the problem of creating a custom recommendation that identifies which Amazon RDS instances are missing a tag, but they can be applied to other use cases too.
Note: To use the option of creating custom recommendations and standards for AWS and GCP workloads, you need to have the Defender Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) plan enabled....
